explanation: [0-0] Herobrine and Notch are standing in separate mineshafts, surrounded by gray stone walls. Both are holding diamond pickaxes.

[0-2] They start mining forward. Herobrine discovers sparkling diamonds behind the stone and is delighted. On the other hand, Notch finds gray stone with black lines and appears somewhat disappointed.

[0-2] They start mining forward. Herobrine discovers sparkling diamonds behind the stone and is delighted. On the other hand, Notch finds gray stone with black lines and appears somewhat disappointed.

[2-10] They continue mining forward. The camera zooms in on Herobrine as he dances happily. Notch sits down, covering his face with his hands. The camera zooms out, and Herobrine, still dancing, notices Notch sitting on the ground. Herobrine throws a diamond down to him. Notch looks up and down a few times.

[10-13] Subsequently, the camera zooms in on Herobrine as he continues mining diamonds. The scene switches to Notch below, who looks forward with his head tilted and eyes wide open. Zooming out, fire can be seen in front of the diamond ore Herobrine is mining.

[13-17] Afterwards, a blue rectangle appears above Notch's head, containing the white text "Help Him?" Below the text is a white thumbs-up icon. A countdown "3, 2, 1" appears to the right of the thumbs-up. A mouse cursor appears on the right side, moves to the white thumbs-up, and clicks it.

[17-25] Then, Notch raises his diamond pickaxe, breaks the gray stone above him, and jumps into the upper mineshaft. Notch stretches his head forward. The camera zooms out as Herobrine turns to look at Notch. Next, Notch shakes his diamond pickaxe. Herobrine turns his head, looking towards the fire with wide eyes. Herobrine nods at Notch and offers him his diamonds.
